Merge function for RLum.Results S4-class objects

Source: R/merge_RLum.Results.R
merge_RLum.Results.Rd

Function merges objects of class RLum.Results. The slots in the objects are combined depending on the object type, e.g., for data.frame and matrix rows are appended.

merge_RLum.Results(objects)

Arguments

objects

list (required): a list of RLum.Results objects

Note

The originator is taken from the first element and not reset to merge_RLum

Function version

0.2.0

Author

Sebastian Kreutzer, Geography & Earth Sciences, Aberystwyth University (United Kingdom) , RLum Developer Team

How to cite

Kreutzer, S., 2021. merge_RLum.Results(): Merge function for RLum.Results S4-class objects. Function version 0.2.0. In: Kreutzer, S., Burow, C., Dietze, M., Fuchs, M.C., Schmidt, C., Fischer, M., Friedrich, J., Mercier, N., Philippe, A., Riedesel, S., Autzen, M., Mittelstrass, D., Gray, H.J., 2021. Luminescence: Comprehensive Luminescence Dating Data Analysis. R package version 0.9.14. https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=Luminescence
